name: Ghost Hospital: Escape Town De
description:
Master The Sky: Future Flying Car is a very realistic first-person shooting game with Immersive 3D effects! Goal as a retired veteran is to save humanity from the zombie apocalypse. The shoot 2 bullets to kill one zombie, but if shoot its head only need shoot 1 bullet to kill.
Features
- Enjoy the realistic sound effect and music
- shoot zombies in FPS mode
- Fun to play! Halloween Special
- Different type of Zombie Models
- Different Guns to chose from
- Multiple Targets to shoot
